system.descriptionText: Character spends a Half Action and makes +0 Tech-Use Test. If successful they assume direct control over one of their Servitor Comrades within comms range, +1 per Degree of Success on test beyond the first. They may make a Half-Action Melee or Ranged attack with each servitor against a target within range. The Servitors use the Character's Weapon/Ballistic Skill Characteristics in place of their own for these attacks.
